    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    ElectricVehicle()
    A constructor of the electric vehicle that uses the default values of the default vehicle constructor the power level consumed by the electric vehicle is set by default to 0
     
    ElectricVehicle​(Long serialNumber, String made, String model, Integer date, Double maxSpeed, Double brakePower)
    A parametred constructor that inherits some variables of the superclass vehicle the power level consumed is set is set in this electricvehicle constructor

    GasVehicle()
    A constructor of the gas vehicle that uses the default values of the default vehicle constructor
     
    GasVehicle​(Long serialNumber, String made, String model, Integer date, Double maxSpeed, Double brakePower)
    Inherits the serial number, the made, the model, the date of manufacture, the trip counter, the type from the super and specifies the value of the fuel consumed of this GasVehicle created.
     
    GasVehicle​(Long serialNumber, String made, String model, Integer date, Integer tripCounter, Double maxSpeed, Double brakePower, Double fuelConsumed)
    Gets the value of fuel consumed by this GasVehicle.
     
    Vehicle()
    Constructor that does not receives any value and initialize with given value to the parameters of this vehicle.
     
    Vehicle​(Long serialNumber, String made, String model, Integer date, Double maxSpeed, Double brakePower)
    Constructor that receives the serial number, the made, the model, the date, the max speed and the brake power and initialize trip counter to 0, and set them as value for this vehicle.
     
    Vehicle​(Long serialNumber, String made, String model, Integer date, Integer tripCounter, Double maxSpeed, Double brakePower)
    Constructor that receives the serial number, the made, the model, the date, the trip counter, the max speed and the brake power and set them as value for this vehicle.
